casebody.data:
STATE
v.
CRUZ AND McQUEEN. No. 561A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2004. James R. Parish, Fayetteville, for McQueen.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of December 2004 for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Cumberland County Board of Education shall have up to and including the 16th day of January 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of December 2004."
